release_notes: Release 4.2.1 - 2025-08-08\✨ New Features:\  • feat(testing): add comprehensive regression test suite\  • feat: implement intelligent fallback resource display with AWS Prescriptive Guidance enhancements\  • feat: implement GitHub → Docusaurus transformation + AWS Prescriptive Guidance templates\  • feat: add comprehensive fork PR security workflow\🐛 Bug Fixes:\  • fix: apply black formatting with correct line length (88)\  • fix(testing): resolve flake8 and black formatting issues in regression tests\💄 Style Changes:\  • style: apply black formatting to entire repository\  • style: apply black formatting and fix critical flake8 issues\📊 Summary: 8 commits in this release\🔀 Triggered by PR #25
